tweet.text: It’s #NationalLimerickDay! Share your #history or FRUS-related limericks. Here’s our stab at one: Lim’ricks in #FRUS there are none But if looking for poems here is one: A sympathy sent In a Lincoln lament On the price of a victory won https://t.co/jVnSvlOEau #twitterstorians
tweet.html: It’s #NationalLimerickDay! Share your #history or FRUS-related limericks. Here’s our stab at one: Lim’ricks in #FRUS there are none But if looking for poems here is one: A sympathy sent In a Lincoln lament On the price of a victory won go.usa.gov/xQNH8 #twitterstorians
